Biden: s campaign quickly clarified that he was referring to his policy on ending new gas and oil production on federal lands, not banning fracking outright.
Snopes fact: checking readers' inquiries about Biden's stance on fracking after the vice presidential debate between Pence and Harris.
The official Biden: Harris clean energy policy proposes "banning new oil and gas permitting on public lands and waters," but does not propose an outright ban on fracking.
